    2. ë™ì  ê³„íšë²• ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜

    - Recursive Call í™œìš©

    def fibo(num) :
    if num <= 1 :
        return num
    return fibo(num - 1) + fibo(num - 2)


fibo(4)  # 3


    - ë™ì  ê³„íšë²• í™œìš©

    def fibo_dp(num) :
    cache = [0 for index in range(num + 1)]
    cache[0] = 0
    cache[1] = 1
    for index in range(2, num+1) :
        cache[index] = cache[index - 1] + cache[index - 2]
    return cache[num]


fibo_dp(10)  # 55
